column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Li says : " Your Princess Azula , clever and beautiful , disguised herself as the enemy and entered the Earth Kingdom 's Capital .
#Text=And the Earth Kingdom fell !
#Text=" Li says : " Azula 's agents quickly overtook the entire city .
#Text=They went to Ba Sing Se 's great walls ... " Li and Lo says : " And brought them down !
#Text=" Li says : " The armies of the Fire Nation surged through the walls and swarmed over Ba Sing Se , securing our victory .
#Text=" Li and Lo says : " Now the heroes have returned home !
#Text=" Lo says : " Your princess , Azula ... " Li says : " And after three long years , your prince has returned ... " Li and Lo says : " Zuko !
#Text=" Sokka says : " After what happened at Ba Sing Se , we had to get you to safety .
#Text=We flew back to Chameleon Bay where we found my father and the other Water Tribe men .
#Text=The Earth King decided he wanted to travel the world in disguise , so he set off alone .
#Text=Well , not completely alone .
#Text=Soon , the bay was overrun by Fire Nation ships .
#Text=Rather than fight them all , we captured a single ship and made it our disguise .
#Text=Since then we 've been traveling west .
#Text=We crossed through the Serpent 's Pass a few days ago .
#Text=We 've seen a few Fire Nation ships , but none have bothered us .
#Text=" Aang says : " So what now ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " We 've been working on a modified version of the invasion plan .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's Sokka 's invasion plan .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Yes , Sokka 's plan .
#Text=We wo n't be able to mount a massive invasion without the Earth King 's armies , but the solar eclipse will still leave the Fire Nation vulnerable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So we 're planning a smaller invasion .
#Text=Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom .
#Text=We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke .
#Text=" Pipsqueak says : " Good to see you again , Aang !
#Text=" Sokka says : " And the best part is , the eclipse is n't even our biggest advantage !
#Text=We have a secret ... You !
#Text=" Aang says : " Me ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yep , the whole world thinks you 're dead !
#Text=Is n't that great ?
#Text=" Aang says : " The world thinks I 'm dead ?
#Text=How is that good news ?
#Text=That 's terrible !
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , it 's great !
#Text=It means the Fire Nation wo n't be hunting us anymore !
#Text=And even better , they wo n't be expecting you on the Day of Black Sun !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , no , no , no , no .
#Text=You have no idea .
#Text=This is so messed up !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll handle this .
#Text=The Avatar is back .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , wait !
#Text=Remember , they do n't know we 're not Fire Nation !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Everyone just stay calm .
#Text=Bato and I will take care of this .
#Text=" Aang says : " I hate not being able to do anything .
#Text=" Toph says : " Hopefully , you wo n't need to .
#Text=" Fire Navy officer says : " Commander , why are you off course ?
#Text=All Western Fleet ships are supposed to be moving toward Ba Sing Se to support the occupation !
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Actually , we 're from the Eastern Fleet .
#Text=We have orders to deliver some cargo .
#Text=" Fire Navy officer says : " Ahhh ... Eastern Fleet .
#Text=Well , nice of Admiral Chan to let us know he was sending one of his ships our way .
#Text=" Bato says : " I 'm sure Admiral Chan meant no disrespect , sir .
#Text=" Fire Navy officer says : " I mean , how hard is it to write a quick note and send a hawk our way ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Next time , we 'll send two hawks to make sure you get the message .
#Text=" Guard says : " Sir ... Admiral Chan has been on leave for two months at Ember Island .
#Text=" Fire Navy officer says : " What ?
#Text=Why does n't anyone ever tell me anything ?
#Text=Something 's not right ; they should have known that .
#Text=I think this is a captured ship .
#Text=Just stay quiet until we 're safely across the ramp .
#Text=Then we 'll sink this ship .
#Text=" Toph says : " They know !
#Text=" Azula says : " You seem so downcast .
#Text=Has Mai gotten to you already ?
#Text=Though actually , Mai has been in a strangely good mood lately .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I have n't seen Dad yet .
#Text=I have n't seen him in three years , since I was banished .
#Text=" Azula says : " So what ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " So , I did n't capture the Avatar .
#Text=" Azula says : " Who cares ?
#Text=The Avatar is dead ... unless you think he somehow miraculously survived .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is water from the spirit oasis at the north pole .
#Text=It has special properties so I 've been saving it for something important .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No .
#Text=There 's no way he could have survived .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well , then I 'm sure you have nothing to worry about .
#Text=" Toph says : " Load the Toph !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm gon na give us some cover !
#Text="
